comments:

Note that I've found this VM to be somewhat flaky, often getting crashes when 
debugging: ibm-sdk-n130p-sr10a.
So it might possible be just a memory corruption.

Just got the same error exiting my host, so this discounts the flaky target 
theory.

Could not write workspace metadata: ... /.root/41.tree.

Got it again after restarting and exiting again.
I've zipped up my workspace in case you need it.

The stack trace in your follow-up is different, and appears to be a duplicate of 
bug 14179.  I can't figure out where the ClassCastExceptions come from in the 
first set of stack traces, but chances are it's a side-effect of the same bug.

I'm closing this bug as a duplicate.  Please reopen or enter new bug report if 
this is experienced in builds > 20020418.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 14179 ***
